Keywords: Infinity Watch , Monster , Scientist
Real Name: Harvey Elder
Special Powers
SUBTERRANEAN INVASION: Passenger: 6, but only to carry characters with the Monster keyword, regardless of size.
MOLOID PILE: Mole Man has a range of 6 and 2 targets. // Incapacitate. When Mole Man uses it, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to each hit character that was given an action token.

January 8, 2022
budweiserclix
Personally I don't see much merit in carrying a bunch of wendigos. Maybe it's because I always play them at 15pts and see carrying 4 as an easy EE or Quake target for some quick points. I'm also bummed that this is a completely different figure than it used to be. He's still very useful, I won't deny that. But, I would have been much happier if this was still the friendly monster mind controlling machine he used to be at a lower cost. I'll probably continue using bombshell raven over him as a monster taxi but maybe I'll field him someday if I need multiple taxis.

December 31, 2021
Buckwheat
Apart from the Trait, he doesn't have much going for him. What with it making his speed value almost abysmal, all the Sidestep, Carry ability, and Underworld TA, that many of his monsters already possess, seem sufficient to provide ample mobility. The attack power isn't worth much, when he can hardly hit the broad side of a barn. I prefer his predecessor, from ~10 years ago.
